alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL ONTONAGON COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Porcupine Mountains State Park, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Porcupine Mountains State Park, Bergland, Silver City, Northern Lake Gogebic, Norwich, White Pine, Mirror Lake, Lake of the Clouds, and Victoria Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
